First strike
[i]Cutthroat Charm[/i] – When Severa, Secret Dreamer enters, other creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Severa attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until the end of your next turn.
